Package engine.move

Class MoveGenerator

java.lang.Object
engine.move.MoveGenerator
public class MoveGenerator extends Object
Generates a List of legal moves for a BoardInfo object.

  • Method Details

    • generateTilesControlled

      public static List<Coordinate> generateTilesControlled(BoardInfo boardInfo)
      Generates a list of tiles controlled by the current player. The "tiles controlled" are defined as the ending tiles of all the pseudo-legal moves the current player can make.
      Parameters:
      boardInfo - a BoardInfo object that defines the board state.
      Returns:
      a List of Coordinate objects representing all the tiles controlled by the current player.

    • generateLegalMoves

      public static List<Move> generateLegalMoves(BoardInfo boardInfo)
      Generates a List of strictly legal moves that can be made by the current player.
      Parameters:
      boardInfo - a BoardInfo object that defines the board state.
      Returns:
      a List of strictly legal moves that can be made by the current player.

    • generatePseudoLegalMoves

      public static List<Move> generatePseudoLegalMoves(BoardInfo boardInfo)
      Generates a List of pseudo-legal moves that can be made by the current player. A pseudo-legal move is defined as any move that adheres to the regular movement rules of a given piece, but ignores any possible check state of the current player's king.
      Parameters:
      boardInfo - a BoardInfo object that defines the board state.
      Returns:
      a List of pseudo-legal moves that can be made by the current player.
